Package game.items.weapons

Class Broadsword

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.items.weapons.Broadsword
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.Weapon, WeaponFocus, PlayerPurchase, PlayerSell, Upgrade
public class Broadsword
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
implements WeaponFocus, PlayerSell, PlayerPurchase, Upgrade
A class representing a Broadsword, which is a type of WeaponItem. It can focus for a limited number of turns to increase its hit rate and damage multiplier.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static float DAMAGE_MULTIPLIER_INCREASE
    The amount by which the damage multiplier increases when the Broadsword is actively focused.
    static int DEFAULT_BOUND
    The default bound value used for random calculations.
    static int DEFAULT_DAMAGE
    The default damage value for a Broadsword.
    static float DEFAULT_DAMAGE_MULTIPLIER
    The default damage multiplier value for a Broadsword.
    static int DEFAULT_HIT_RATE
    The default hit rate value for a Broadsword.
    static int FOCUS_HIT_RATE
    The hit rate value when the Broadsword is actively focused.
    static int MERCHANT_BROADSWORD_BUYING_PRICE
    The buying price of a Broadsword when sold to a merchant.
    static int TRAVELLER_ASK_PROBABILITY
    The probability that a traveller will ask for a lower price when purchasing a Broadsword.

      public static final int MERCHANT_BROADSWORD_BUYING_PRICE
      The buying price of a Broadsword when sold to a merchant. Merchants will buy Broadswords at this price.

    • Broadsword

      public Broadsword()
      Constructor to create a Broadsword. Initializes the name, display character, default damage, and initial hit rate of the Broadsword.

  • Method Details

    • resetBroadsword

      public void resetBroadsword()
      Resets the Broadsword to its initial state, including hit rate and damage multiplier.

    • tick

      public void tick​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location currentLocation, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor)
      Inform a carried Broadsword of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn if the Broadsword is being carried by an actor.
      Overrides:
      tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this Broadsword.
      actor - The actor carrying this Broadsword.

    • tick

      public void tick​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location currentLocation)
      Inform an Item on the ground of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn if the item rests on the ground.
      Overrides:
      tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the ground on which the Broadsword lies.

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor otherActor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location location)
      Returns a list of allowable actions for the Broadsword when it's in a location. It includes the SellAction against other actors(Who has MERCHANT status) at the location. It includes the AttackAction against other actors at the location.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      otherActor - The actor to perform actions on.
      location - The location where the Broadsword is.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions.

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor owner)
      Returns a list of allowable actions for the owner of the Broadsword. It includes the FocusAction to activate the Broadsword's special focus ability.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      owner - The actor who owns the Broadsword.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions for the owner.

    • activeWeaponChange

      public void activeWeaponChange()
      Increase the damage multiplier by 10% when the weapon is actively focused.
      Specified by:
      activeWeaponChange in interface WeaponFocus

    • inactiveWeaponChange

      public void inactiveWeaponChange()
      Increase the damage multiplier by 10% and set the hit rate to 90% when the weapon is not actively focused.

    • upgradeItem

      public void upgradeItem()
      Upgrades the Broadsword's damage by a set amount. This method increments the additional damage of the Broadsword.
      Specified by:

    • damage

      public int damage()
      Calculates the total damage dealt by the Broadsword. This method combines the base damage of the Broadsword with any additional damage from upgrades.
      Specified by:
      damage in interface edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.Weapon
      Overrides:
      damage in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
      Returns:
      The total damage value of the Broadsword.
